thread.title: BRIEF-Jinkosolar Announces Proposed Follow-On Offering Of 3,600,000 American Depositary Shares And $35 Mln Concurrent Private Placement

title: BRIEF-Jinkosolar Announces Proposed Follow-On Offering Of 3,600,000 American Depositary Shares And $35 Mln Concurrent Private Placement
text:
39 PM / in a minute BRIEF-Jinkosolar Announces Proposed Follow-On Offering Of 3,600,000 American Depositary Shares And $35 Mln Concurrent Private Placement Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Jinkosolar Holding Co Ltd: 
* JINKOSOLAR ANNOUNCES PROPOSED FOLLOW-ON OFFERING OF 3,600,000 AMERICAN DEPOSITARY SHARES AND US$35 MILLION CONCURRENT PRIVATE PLACEMENT 
* JINKOSOLAR HOLDING CO LTD - COMMENCES FOLLOW-ON OFFERING OF 3.6 MILLION AMERICAN DEPOSITARY SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
